data.title: the best place ever
data.text: I like to how cool the buildings looked. Nothing to dislike about this place. I also liked to how fancy the buildings looked.

data.title: Patriot's Park
data.text: Actually I can't remember much about it but it left a good impression.  I can't really say more than that.

data.title: Patriots Sq Park-replaced by CityScape
data.text: I've lived in Phoenix for 30 years. Patriots Sq Park, which was a real park, has been replaced by CityScape. 3 photos-if they are posted-show what it used to look like. All that is gone. It was dismantled beginning in 2009. CityScape, I believe, is 4 blocks and I only saw one in Oct 2012. There is a small park like area, with grass, a fountain and umbrellas. It's nice. There are lots of shops and restaurants there-completely different than it used to be. I'll post my most recent photos of the area under CityScape. I think it's worth seeing. Some of the questions about this location, I am unable to answer. Janet W

data.title: Not as good as its hipped t o be
data.text: I have seen better its ok if your in the down town area and want to  breeze thru but not if your wanting to go from out lining areas
